description: A healthy salad full of big, tropical flavours and bright colours. Try to get Alphonso mangoes, if possible, which are famed for their sweetness.
keywords: Grain salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Quinoa Salad With Mango, Lime & Toasted Coconut Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large mango, peeled, stoned, and cut into bitesized pieces
1 lime, peeled, segented, and segents halved

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the coconut by dryfrying it in a pan over a medium heat for 2-3 minutes until golden, stirring so that it doesn’t burn. Remove from the heat and allow to cool.
To make the dressing, place all the ingredients in a small bowl or jug and whisk. Taste and adjust the seasoning as needed.

Cook the quinoa according to pack instructions. Drain well and tip into a large serving bowl. While the quinoa is still warm, stir through the butter beans, onion, mango, lime, mint, and parsley, and season.
Pour over the dressing and stir well. Sprinkle the toasted coconut on top and serve immediately.
